keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 Debut on Kyuka Island
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 is introduced relaxing on vacation at Kyuka Island, preparing Earl Grey tea while discussing new orders with Miss Goldenweek.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Mr. 3 as a Baroque Works Officer Agent, establishing his refined and intellectual personality.

keyMoments.title: Doru Doru no Mi Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 demonstrates his Wax-Wax Fruit powers by creating a wax house structure, showcasing his ability to create and manipulate wax.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Mr. 3's Devil Fruit abilities that will be central to his fighting style.

abilities.description: Mr. 3 can create and manipulate wax for various purposes including constructing structures, creating weapons, and trapping opponents.

relationships.description: Mr. 3's Baroque Works partner, Miss Goldenweek serves as his partner agent and assistant.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek are shown vacationing together on Kyuka Island.

reveals.information: Ate the Doru Doru no Mi (Wax-Wax Fruit)
Prefers refined things like Earl Grey tea and considers himself an intellectual

name.japanese: ミス・ゴールデンウィーク

keyMoments.title: Miss Goldenweek Debut
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek is introduced on Kyuka Island, casually revealing to Mr. 3 that she received orders days ago but neglected to share them immediately.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Miss Goldenweek, establishing her extremely laid-back personality.

keyMoments.title: Colors Trap Hint
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek is shown with her painting supplies and colored paints, hinting at her unique ability.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up her Colors Trap hypnosis ability that will be revealed more fully in later episodes.

abilities.description: A hypnosis technique using painted designs and colors to manipulate emotions and behavior, though not fully demonstrated yet.

relationships.description: Miss Goldenweek's Baroque Works partner, Mr. 3 serves as the lead agent while she provides support.

evolutionMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek and Mr. 3 are shown vacationing together on Kyuka Island.

reveals.information: Officer Agent of Baroque Works, partnered with Mr. 3
Extremely laid-back, often delays sharing important information
Uses painting and colors as her primary tools

keyMoments.title: Hunting Competition with Sanji Begins
keyMoments.description: Zoro accepts Sanji's challenge to a hunting competition on Little Garden, marking the formal beginning of their legendary rivalry.
keyMoments.significance: This establishes the competitive dynamic between Zoro and Sanji that will continue throughout the entire series.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Encounters Triceratops
keyMoments.description: Zoro battles a Triceratops, viewing it as both a challenge and potential food for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's combat abilities and practical mindset.
keyMoments.quote: I wonder if this thing is edible.

relationships.description: Zoro and Sanji's rivalry is formalized through their hunting competition on Little Garden.

evolutionMoments.description: The hunting competition marks the official start of their ongoing rivalry.

keyMoments.title: Initiates Hunting Competition with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sanji challenges Zoro to see who can hunt the biggest dinosaur, starting their legendary rivalry.
keyMoments.significance: This competition establishes the ongoing competitive dynamic between Sanji and Zoro.
keyMoments.quote: I bet I can hunt bigger prey than you, moss-head!

keyMoments.title: Sanji vs Tyrannosaurus Rex
keyMoments.description: Sanji battles a T-Rex that attempts to eat him, using his powerful kicks to defend himself.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Sanji's combat abilities against large prehistoric creatures.
keyMoments.quote: I'm not going to be dinosaur food!

relationships.description: Sanji's rivalry with Zoro is formalized through the hunting competition on Little Garden.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji initiates the hunting competition that formalizes their rivalry.

keyMoments.title: Recalls Little Garden's Legend
keyMoments.description: Nami remembers reading about Little Garden in a book, recalling Louis Arnote's account and warnings about the island.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important context about the island's dangerous reputation and history.
keyMoments.quote: I remember now! This island is called Little Garden, and according to the book, no one who has gone there has ever come back!

reveals.information: Wakana Yamazaki substitutes as Nami's voice actress for episodes 70-78 due to Akemi Okamura's maternity leave
